text:
Message 477 of 4024
WTF are you talking about? I was talking about other plans  we need to make in this thread. Decisions we can make in our on good time. If it is
urgent I don’t bother with it here because there is likely a couple of rounds back and forth. That’s why I sent an email to ask if we could text if it was
an urgent ask. That’s all.
Can you get off my D while I’m trying to do something that is helping you out so you can work?
I’m freaking trying to carry the water for us both here as best I can, Christine. Bitching me out feels wrong.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 11:37 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 11:38 AM)
Subject:Re: Apartment
Message 478 of 4024
This is type of emails you send to me.
After the recent events and the continued way you treat me in phone calls, emails, texts and here, I am trying to minimize communications.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 12:16 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 01:35 PM)
Subject:Disrespectful and abusive emails.
Attachments:IMG_9445.PNG (234 KB)
Message 479 of 4024
Can you share details on how to update Xfinity’s password for home network. Thank you
Sent:01/17/2024 at 01:32 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 01:36 PM)
Subject:Xfinity
Message 480 of 4024
May we please take him out of the middle? See attached.
I am worried he feels like he is to blame for this. That is the last thing we want and what they say always to be on the lookout for in a divorce. His text
pains me and makes my heart hurt.
I’d like to be able to see him today to reassure him this is an issue you and I are addressing, and he has zero to do with it. I want to encourage open and
honest conversations with both of us.
Thanks!
Sent:01/17/2024 at 01:50 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 02:02 PM)
Subject:Adrian
Attachments:AD_Text.jpg (85 KB)
